Text: so long as scenebalance puts what each episode is called in the tile well be ok but if they only put an episode number eg s02e10 thats where f*** ups happen and people miss things, if wikipedia is correct i prefer episodes to be numbered correctly but thats my preference, i love all release groups efforts so misnumbering things sometimes i can live with thanks guys :) please keep the 720p versions of goldrush coming picture quality so much better than the 350mb versions
